description.raw:
The PR covers the intallation of the subt tarball to be able to run the smoke test. The changes are in the \`subt-compilation-base.bash\` file.

To support the tarball \(generated probably with catkin\_make\) I needed to implement the support for catkin\_make in our scripts \(previously only using catkin tools\).

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=30)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/30/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/30)

The build is failing because of the tests, probably related to the comms inside docker:

```shell
CommsClient::CommsClient() error: Local address shouldn't be empty
[addr] Bind() error: Address [other] is not your local address
[addr] Bind() error: Address [addr] already used
[addr] Bind() error: Address [multicast] already used
```

Other build using catkin tools and this branch:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_kinetic-xenial-amd64&build=89)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_kinetic-xenial-amd64/89/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_kinetic-xenial-amd64/89/))

title: Fix the subt CI
